attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make it illegal to demonstrate against British forces and our way of life in the UK. To cover mainland UK only.

rejection.details:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Parades/

Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
